name: Kuma's Awakening
description:
Kuma has finally awoken after a long, relaxing hibernation. Now, the rest of the town needs help waking up! Both the town's villagers and its dark secrets will soon be awoken-- by Kuma!

Sprites/animations done by me.

Tilesets used:

https://monkeyimage.itch.io/world-tilesets-remastered

https://reyhanpanci256.itch.io/basic-gb
